title: For My Beloved Friends
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Hey Rina, isn’t that the candy you talked about the other day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. I told Ai-san and Mia-chan about it yesterday, and they gave some to me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, I see. Fufu, the two of them really love you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>They mean a lot to me. I love them a lot too. What should I give them in return?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Hmm...... What if you gave them their favorite kinds of candies?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Good idea. I know what candies they like. Thanks, Eli-san. I’ll go to a supermarket on the way home.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>There’s a supermarket nearby. Would you like to go together? Thinking about this made me want to buy candies for everyone else in µ’s.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Great, let’s go together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thanks. Should we go now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okay. Rina-chan Board says, “Excited.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
